note:
Likes to grow food plants. Also likes trains, tunnels, political scifi, human rights, animal welfare. Also to undermine capitalism's deathgrip on our public institutions whenever opportunities arise. Living in Dublin, doing MSc at University of Edinburgh. Born in the sixties, decade of revo's. Proud parent of neurodiverse bunch and #actuallyautistic
My profile pic is actually St. Aidan from the animated movie "The secret of Kells". The top photo is our cat Lily who is fully black with long hair
